title.narrative: Office-wide planning, performance monitoring, evaluation and assurance activities.

description.narrative: Resources were allocated in a timely manner; all grants were properly managed. Programme budget utilization reached 100% as of 31 December 2019. Quality assurance activities in 2019 were fully implemented with monthly review and monitoring through CMT. All HACT programme and financial assurance activities were achieved, according to global guidelines. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
